title: API Keys
lede: Learn how to generate, manage, and secure your API keys for programmatic access to iMash.

sections.title: Generating API Keys
sections.content:
API keys provide secure access to the iMash platform programmatically.

Steps to Generate:

  1. Navigate to Settings â†’ API Keys
  2. Click 'Generate New Key'
  3. Set permissions and expiration
  4. Copy and save securely

sections.title: Security Best Practices
sections.content:
Keep your API keys secure by following these guidelines:

  • Never expose keys in client-side code
  • Use environment variables
  • Rotate keys regularly
  • Set appropriate permissions
